content: --अपर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} eastern and western. कतमोऽयं पूर्वापरसमुद्रावगाढःसानुमानालोक्यत <ls>Ś. 7</ls>; पूर्वापरौ तोयनिधी वगाह्य <ls>Ku. 1. 1.</ls> {2} first and last. {3} prior and subsequent, preceding and following. {4} connected with another. (--रं {1} what is before and behind. {2} connection. {3} the proof and the thing to be proved.
